name: Azvameth
origin:
- From Previous version, Betty from Camila Cuevas's Glitchtale. This was also made right before Vora's release, as a test to see if I could guess how Vora would work like.
- Renzan also helped with ideas.
bio:
[Possessed Kid]'s Big Sister. Her parents always stressed her, too, and thus she often lashed out towards her little brother, too, because of that.
One day, however, a terrible car accident took her life at the age of 17(?).
Since then, she has been living in hell for years, and has worked hard to climb up the ranks and become the wife of the Incubus Prince.

However, her interests were mostly to become more and more powerful, unlike her more passive husband.

And her plan to achieve that is to take her little brother's soul . . .
personality:
- Crude, harsh
- Always wants to dominate and rule over others
- Regards her husband as nothing more than a battery
- Only talks sweetly when she wants something and tries to be manipulative
- Exhibited similar behavior before becoming a demon as well, but much less noticeable
appearance:
- Worn, but not sexualized armor
- Blood in a lot of places
- Maybe a knife is stuck to her back, but she left it in cuz it's badass?

abilities.name: Obsession Overdrive
abilities.description: The first enemy player you hit with {{ABILITY:1}} is now marked as your "Obsession Target" for the next 5 seconds. Every time you damage your Obsession Target (except Damage over Time effects), you gain an Obsession Stack, up to 10 Stacks. If your Obsession Target dies, you get 4 additional Stacks. Each Stack increases the damage of every non-Ultimate ability by 5%. While you're Out of Combat, you lose a Stack every 0.5 seconds. All stacks are lost on death.

abilities.name: Hellclaw Scythe
abilities.description: A Scythe made out of a hellbeast's Claws, dealing 450 Damage every 0.5 seconds at melee range. Swinging while not damaging an enemy player will result in 50% Self-Damage being applied.

abilities.name: Purge with Sin
abilities.description:
If you have 4 or less Stacks of Obsession, leave a rune behind and your Primary Fire makes you dash forward instead for the duration. Hitting an enemy during a dash stops you in place and deals 400 Damage to them. If you don't hit an enemy along the way, this ability will be instantly canceled. After 3 dashes you teleport back to the rune. Can be reactivated to cancel early. You cannot use another ability for the duration.

If you have 5 or more Stacks of Obsession, consume 5 Stacks to swing your Scythe from below upwards, dealing 600 Damage to an enemy hit. If this hits an enemy player, become Invulnerable and Immovable for 2 seconds and launch them upwards a bit, Rooting them for 1 second.

abilities.name: Fearsome Presence
abilities.description: After a 1-second wind-up, teleport to the enemy you last hit with Hellclaw Scythe if they are nearby. The maximum distance of the teleport is increased by 10% for every Obsession Stack you have.

abilities.name: Hunting Instinct
abilities.description: Gain +25 {{KW:Speed}} for 4 seconds, during which your current or last Obsession Target will be {{KW:Reveal|2}} to you. You can re-activate this ability during its duration while facing a wall to make you hit it with your Scythe, after which you propel yourself upwards 60 units, but the ability will be canceled. If you have 4 or less Stacks of Obsession upon cast, holster your Scythe for the duration, being unable to use another ability for the duration, but having +20 Armor while it lasts. Activating an ability other than {{ABILITY:1}} cancels this ability.

abilities.name: Bloodbath Pirouette
abilities.description:
If you have an Obsession Target, start spinning with your Scythe out at a rapid speed, dealing 200 Damage every 0.2 seconds 3 times. 

If all 3 shots did damage to your Obsession Target, hit them from below with your Scythe, dealing 500 Damage and sending them flying 100 units into the air.

	If they are Immovable or otherwise could not have been lifted, that slice will deal an additional 500 Damage instead.

	If they hit a ceiling (other than the skybox) before reaching that height, they get Stunned for 1.5 seconds and come crashing down to you.

	Otherwise, jump up to them and hit them from above for 600 initial Damage and another 400 Damage dealt as Bleed damage over 2 seconds, sending them crashing down onto the ground, then go down towards them.

Otherwise, charge forward, dealing 300 Damage and dragging the first enemy player you come in contact with with you 60 units, being Invulnerable and Immovable while you do so.

The timer for how long a player is your target is paused during this ability's duration, regardless of circumstance.

talents.name: Murder Machine
talents.description: You never holster your weapon when activating {{ABILITY:4}} and you always have the {{KW:Armor}} bonus during it. Scaling a wall with {{ABILITY:4}} now doesn't cancel the ability.

talents.name: Kept In Check
talents.description: {{ABILITY:3}} makes the target {{KW:Silence|2}} for 1 second upon teleporting.

talents.name: Sadistic Restoration
talents.description: Heal yourself by 100% of the Damage you deal during {{ABILITY:2}}.

talents.name: Anger Issues
talents.description: Your basic abilities charge 8% faster for every obsession stack you have.
